TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OperationContext extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.IExtensibleObject`1<class System.ServiceModel.OperationContext>
Public NotInheritable Class OperationContext Implements IExtensibleObject(Of OperationContext)

summary.span: 提供对服务方法的执行上下文的访问。

span.span: Provides access to the execution context of a service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 从服务操作中的访问当前操作执行环境。Use the from within a service operation to access the current operation execution environment. 特别是，操作上下文用于访问双工服务中的回调通道、存储整个操作部分的额外状态数据、访问传入消息头和属性以及添加传出消息头和属性。In particular, the operation context is used to access callback channels in duplex services, to store extra state data across portions of the operations, and to access incoming message headers and properties as well as add outgoing message headers and properties. 有关使用扩展存储状态数据的详细信息，请参阅 [可扩展对象](/dotnet/framework/wcf/extending/extensible-objects)。For more information about using extensions to store state data, see [Extensible Objects](/dotnet/framework/wcf/extending/extensible-objects). 具有以下属性和方法。The has the following properties and methods. - 属性返回 表示当前执行上下文的对象。The property returns the object representing the current execution context. - 属性返回在其下执行方法的安全环境。The property returns the security environment under which the method executes. - 属性获取操作的 。The property gets the operation's . - 属性返回当前的扩展集合 。The property returns an extension collection for the current . - 属性返回 管理服务的对象。The property returns the object that manages the service. - 属性返回一个值，该值指示方法是否具有支持令牌，如果是，则 属性将获取这些令牌。The property returns a value that indicates whether the method has supporting tokens, if so, the property gets them. - 、 和 属性从传入消息中获取这些项。The , , and properties get these items from the incoming message. - 操作完成后，将触发事件。The event is fired when the operation has completed. - 和 属性将为出站消息获取这些项。The and properties get these items for the outbound message. - 属性返回方法的 实现。The property returns the implementation for the method. - 属性返回 与操作关联的。The property returns the associated with the operation. - 属性返回当前通道和对象的会话标识符。The property returns the session identifier for the current channel and object. - 如果是双工通信，则方法返回调用方的回调通道。The method returns a callback channel to the caller in the case of duplex communication. - 方法提交当前事务。The method commits the current transaction. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性和 方法从方法中将通道返回给调用方。The following code example uses the property and method to obtain the channel back to the caller from within a method. 此示例中的所有方法都是单向方法，使服务和客户端能够独立地进行双向通信。All methods in this example are one-way methods, enabling the service and the client to communicate in both directions independently. 在这种情况下，示例客户端应用程序在退出前只需要一个返回调用，而另一个客户端（例如 Windows 窗体客户端）可以从服务接收任意数量的调用。In this case, the example client application expects only one return call before it exits, but another client, for example a Windows Forms client, can receive any number of calls from the service. [!code-csharp[SCA.CallbackContract#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sca.callbackcontract/cs/services.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SCA.CallbackContract#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/sca.callbackcontract/vb/services.vb#1)] 以下客户端实现 `SampleDuplexHelloCallback` 以接收回调消息。The following client implements the `SampleDuplexHelloCallback` to receive the callback message. 由于在 前面的示例中使用了属性，因此导入的回调协定与服务中的回调协定不是同一名称。The imported callback contract is not the same name as the one in the service, due to the use of the property in the preceding example. 请注意，客户端不对其是否或何时可能收到回调作出任何假设；服务器回调与客户端的出站调用完全无关。Note that the client makes no assumptions about whether or when it might receive a callback; the server callback is entirely independent of the client's outbound call. > [!NOTE] > 有关 在客户端方案中使用类的示例，请参见 。For an example that uses the class in a client scenario, see . [!code-csharp[SCA.CallbackContract#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sca.callbackcontract/cs/client.cs#3)] [!code-vb[SCA.CallbackContract#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/sca.callbackcontract/vb/client.vb#3)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that uses the specified in a client application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 构造函数可在与代理关联的作用域内创建新的操作上下文以修改出站项（如标头）。Use the constructor to create a new operation context within the scope of which the proxy is associated in order to modify outbound items such as headers. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 在客户端应用程序中创建新的上下文以向传出消息添加自定义标头。The following example shows how to use the to create a new context in a client application in order to add a custom header to the outgoing message. [!code-csharp[OperationContextScope#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationcontextscope/cs/client.cs#4)] [!code-vb[OperationContextScope#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationcontextscope/vb/client.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置当前线程的执行上下文。

span.span: Gets or sets the execution context for the current thread.

value.span: 表示当前方法的消息和执行上下文的 。

span.span: The that represents the messaging and execution context of the current method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可获取当前方法的执行和消息上下文。Use the property to obtain the execution and message context for the current method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性和 方法创建从方法内部返回给调用方的通道。The following code example uses the property and method to create a channel back to the caller from within a method. 此示例中的所有方法都是单向方法，使服务和客户端能够独立地进行双向通信。All methods in this example are one-way methods, enabling the service and the client to communicate in both directions independently. 在这种情况下，示例客户端应用程序在退出前只需要一个返回调用，而另一个客户端（例如 Windows 窗体客户端）可以从服务接收任意数量的调用。In this case, the example client application expects only one return call before it exits, but another client, for example a Windows Forms client, can receive any number of calls from the service. [!code-csharp[SCA.CallbackContract#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sca.callbackcontract/cs/services.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SCA.CallbackContract#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/sca.callbackcontract/vb/services.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可获取 用于修改上下文或添加自定义状态的的所有扩展的集合。Use the property to obtain a collection of all extensions of the used to modify the context or add custom state. 有关扩展的详细信息，请参阅 [可扩展对象](/dotnet/framework/wcf/extending/extensible-objects)。For more information about extensions, see [Extensible Objects](/dotnet/framework/wcf/extending/extensible-objects).

summary.span: 获取调用当前操作的客户端实例的通道。

span.span: Gets a channel to the client instance that called the current operation.

returns.span: 一个客户端实例的通道，该客户端实例调用 属性中指定类型的操作。

span.span: A channel to the client instance that called the operation of the type specified in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 属性以获取一个通道，该通道可用于在调用服务的客户端实例上调用操作。Call the property to obtain a channel that you can use to call operations on the client instance that called the service. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性和 方法创建从操作内返回给调用方的通道。The following code example uses the property and method to create a channel back to the caller from within a operation. 此示例中的所有操作都是单向操作，使服务和客户端能够独立地进行双向通信。All operations in this example are one-way operations, enabling the service and the client to communicate in both directions independently. 在这种情况下，示例客户端应用程序在退出前只需要一个返回调用，而另一个客户端（例如 Windows 窗体客户端）可以从服务接收任意数量的调用。In this case, the example client application expects only one return call before it exits, but another client, for example a Windows Forms client, can receive any number of calls from the service. [!code-csharp[SCA.CallbackContract#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sca.callbackcontract/cs/services.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SCA.CallbackContract#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/sca.callbackcontract/vb/services.vb#1)] 以下客户端实现 `SampleDuplexHelloCallback` 以接收回调消息。The following client implements the `SampleDuplexHelloCallback` to receive the callback message. 由于在 前面的示例中使用了属性，因此导入的回调协定与服务中的回调协定不是同一名称。The imported callback contract is not the same name as the one in the service, due to the use of the property in the preceding example. 请注意，客户端不对其是否或何时可能收到回调作出任何假设；服务器回调与客户端的出站调用完全无关。Note that the client makes no assumptions about whether or when it might receive a callback; the server callback is entirely independent of the client's outbound call. > [!NOTE] > 有关 在客户端方案中使用类的示例，请参见 。For an example that uses the class in a client scenario, see . [!code-csharp[SCA.CallbackContract#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sca.callbackcontract/cs/client.cs#3)] [!code-vb[SCA.CallbackContract#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/sca.callbackcontract/vb/client.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event OperationCompleted As EventHandler

summary.span: 操作完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将设置为，请使用事件释放参数或返回值 `false` 。Use the event to dispose parameters or a return value if you set to `false`. 通常，将设置 为 `false` 以阻止 WCF 对 参数和返回值对象调用。Normally you set to `false` to prevent WCF from calling on the parameter and return value objects. 但是，如果某些参数需要保留而其他参数需要释放，则此事件是释放这些参数的最佳位置。However, if some parameters need to be preserved while others need to be disposed, this event is the best place to dispose those parameters. 另外，在双工绑定的情况下，此事件可用于在发出当前操作的答复后在回调通道上发送请求。Also, with duplex bindings, this event can be used to send a request on the callback channel after the reply for the current operation is sent. > [!NOTE] > 如果调用方侦听的是 操作的 事件，则在收到响应时可能会阻塞。If a caller is listening for the event for an operation, it is possible to block when the response is received. 处理这种情况的正确方法是，当引发 时在其他线程上调度工作，然后从该事件处理程序立即返回。The proper way to handle this is to schedule work on another thread when is raised and then immediately return from that event handler.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OutgoingMessageHeaders As MessageHeaders

summary.span: 获取活动 的传出消息头。

span.span: Gets the outgoing message headers for the active .

value.span: 一个 对象，包含活动 的出站消息头。

span.span: A object that contains outbound message headers for the active .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性添加由 WCF 客户端对象发送的服务操作或请求标头发送的答复标头。Use this property to add reply headers that are sent by a service operation or request headers that are sent by a WCF client object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 在客户端应用程序中创建新的上下文以向传出消息添加自定义标头。The following example shows how to use the to create a new context in a client application in order to add a custom header to the outgoing message. [!code-csharp[OperationContextScope#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationcontextscope/cs/client.cs#4)] [!code-vb[OperationContextScope#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationcontextscope/vb/client.vb#4)]

value.span: 一个包含出站消息的消息属性的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains the message properties on the outbound message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性添加服务操作中答复消息的消息属性或客户端代理中请求消息的消息属性。Use this property to add message properties for a reply message from a service operation or message properties for a request message from a client proxy.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetTransactionComplete() cil managed

summary.span: 提交当前正在执行的事务。

span.span: Commits the currently executing transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这仅在将 设置为 `false` 的操作中才有用。This is only useful in operations that set to `false`. 通常，服务仅对某些操作（而非全部）执行该操作。Typically, services do this on some but not all operations. 如果 为 false，则事务会自动完成。When is false the transaction completes automatically. 如果无法确定在设计时操作是否需要完成事务，则使用 。Use in cases where it is not possible to determine at design-time whether an operation needs to complete the transaction.

exception.span: 上下文中没有任何事务。

span.span: There is no transaction in the context.

summary.span: 获取一个 类型的 。

span.span: Gets a of type .
A collection of security tokens.
